meanings.definition: Restore to a former state of health or normal life.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the doctor rehabilitated the patient back to good health.
meanings.sent2: The injured bird was rehabilitated and released back into the wild.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's powers were rehabilitated after drinking a special potion.
meanings.sent4: The old house was rehabilitated with a fresh coat of paint and new furniture.
meanings.sent5: The garden was rehabilitated with new plants and flowers, bringing it back to life.

meanings.definition: Restore to a former capacity or position.

meanings.sent4: The old building was rehabilitated into a modern office space.
